response.answer_text: Art - is a diverse range of human activities creating visual, auditory or performing artifacts, expressing the author’s imaginative, conceptual idea, or technical skill, intended to be appreciated for their beauty ir emotional power. (Definition copied from Wikipedia: Art - Wikipedia) Now, if you really think about it, music can express all the things mentioned in the definiton. It can bring out people’s emotions, thoughts, feeling, etc. It expresses the author’s imagination and their skill in creating such masterpieces. They bring out how you really feel. I kept this answer short and sweet. Hope I helped!
Because it is not a science. The science of music is acoustics, sound, etc. An “art” is creative, imaginative, expressive, etc.
